subject: Rosario here
body:
Did you know you could be making a living with your telephone? Perfect for those who want to stay home so call now for information on how this is possible.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-570-1895




Get back to me via Hill4Hill@computer-careers.com if not lnterested





The penguins are in the toilets
